markdown:
| icon           = poe2 huana_tablet icon.png
| description    = Eulogy to Yseyr

2587 AI to 2619 AI

As blood seeps from a wound so deep, an death croons about this sepulcher,

Let silence fall in final wardin to betake my priest intil Berath's dark maw,

After many a battle, when my mace had failt him. Now a bind his wounds,

An can watch only, while he dies.

- Faydwen, Leddy of Vigils
